title: Sticky Sex Situations
itunes:title: Sticky Sex Situations
itunes:subtitle: Sticky Sex Situations
description:
Just in time for the new year, Emily answers the top questions that have been asked in 2014.

Maybe your boyfriend has an uncut member and you don’t know how to ‘handle it.’ Or you want to increase your sexual stamina, but don’t know where to start. From preparation to penetration, Emily gives you the “How To”s of anal sex and gives advice for a listener in a tricky dating situation.. When does a porn obsession become a deal breaker? She and Anderson discuss both sides of the matter.

With the new year right around the corner, it’s time to tackle those important sex questions. Whether you’re a man or a woman, single or in a relationship, this podcast has the answers you need for better sex and relationships in 2015.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
